# Haunting Glide
## Overview
***The following spell is available to [[Ahooling|ahooling]] spellcasters at the GM’s discretion.***

**Level**: 3rd
#Spell-Level/3rd

**School**: Illusion
#Spell-School/Illusion

**Casting Time**: 1 action

**Range**: 60 feet

**Components**: V, S, M (piece of an Underworld creature’s wing)

**Duration**: Concentration, up to 10 minutes.

## Effects
After you cast this spell, as soon as any target in the area leaves the ground, the magic activates, turning them both silent and invisible but only while they remain aloft. Both effects deactivate as soon as a target touches the ground (not the ceilings or walls, but the ground or floor).
